WorkItem.Description:
Can you make a command line option, which allows to read the parameters which can be added by the p: option from a file which could look like this:

 

<parameters>

<param name="RootDirectory" value="D:\Disneyland" />

<param name="DefaultUser" value="MickeyMouse" />

</parameters>

 

Very handy if you have a lot of parameters.
